nameOverride.description: String to partially override generated resource names

fullnameOverride.description: String to fully override generated resource names

description.description: ngrok-operator description that will appear in the ngrok dashboard

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

tag.description: The ngrok operator image tag. Defaults to the chart's appVersion if not specified

pullPolicy.description: The ngrok operator image pull policy.

pullSecrets.description: An array of imagePullSecrets to be used when pulling the image.

region.description: ngrok region to create tunnels in. Defaults to connect to the closest geographical region.

rootCAs.description: Set to "trusted" for the ngrok agent CA or "host" to trust the host's CA. Defaults to "trusted".

serverAddr.description: This is the address of the ngrok server to connect to. You should set this if you are using a custom ingress address.

apiURL.description: This is the URL of the ngrok API. You should set this if you are using a custom API URL.

ngrokMetadata.description: This is a map of key=value,key=value pairs that will be added as metadata to all ngrok api resources created

clusterDomain.description: Configure the default cluster base domain for your kubernetes cluster DNS resolution

podAnnotations.description: Used to apply custom annotations to the ingress pods.

podLabels.description: Used to apply custom labels to the ingress pods.

replicaCount.description: The number of controllers to run.

affinity.description: Affinity for the controller pod assignment

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set.

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set.

create.description: Enable a Pod Disruption Budget creation

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of pods that may be made unavailable

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of pods that should remain scheduled

limits.description: The resources limits for the container

requests.description: The requested resources for the container

extraVolumes.description: An array of extra volumes to add to the controller.

extraVolumeMounts.description: An array of extra volume mounts to add to the controller.

extraEnv.description: an object of extra environment variables to add to the controller.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use.

annotations.description: Additional annotations to add to the ServiceAccount

level.description: The level to log at. One of 'debug', 'info', or 'error'.

stacktraceLevel.description: The level to report stacktrace logs one of 'info' or 'error'.

format.description: The log format to use. One of console, json.

name.description: The name of the secret the credentials are in. If not provided, one will be generated using the helm release name.

apiKey.description: Your ngrok API key. If provided, it will be written to the secret and the authtoken must be provided as well.

authtoken.description: Your ngrok authtoken. If provided, it will be written to the secret and the apiKey must be provided as well.

enabled.description: When true, enable the Ingress controller features

name.description: The name of the ingress class to use.

create.description: Whether to create the ingress class.

default.description: Whether to set the ingress class as default.

watchNamespace.description: The namespace to watch for ingress resources (default all)

controllerName.description: The name of the controller to look for matching ingress classes

replicaCount.description: The number of agents to run.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created for the agent.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use for the agent.

annotations.description: Additional annotations to add to the agent ServiceAccount

enabled.description: When true, enable the Gateway controller
Whether to enable the Endpoint Bindings feature

name.description: Unique name of this kubernetes binding in your ngrok account

description.description: Description of this kubernetes binding in your ngrok account

allowedURLs.description: List of allowed endpoint URL formats that this binding will project into the cluster

serviceAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to projected services bound to an endpoint

serviceLabels.description: Labels to add to projected services bound to an endpoint

ingressEndpoint.description: The hostname of the ingress endpoint for the bindings

replicaCount.description: The number of bindings forwarders to run.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created for the bindings forwarder pod(s).

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use for the bindings forwarder pod(s).

annotations.description: Additional annotations to add to the bindings-forwarder ServiceAccount
